mapper.select: update into account_tb set balance = #{balance} where id = #{id}

select h.id, h.amount,h.h.w_balance,h.`created_at`, ifnull(da.`user_id`,'ATM') as recerver, wa.`number` sender from history_tb h left join account_tb wa on h.w_account_id = wa.id left join account_tb da on h.d_account_id = da.id where h.`w_account_id` = #{userId};

select h.id, h.amount,h.`d_account_id`,h.`created_at`, ifnull(wa.`user_id`,'ATM') as recerver, da.`number` sender from history_tb h left join account_tb da on h.d_account_id = da.id left join account_tb wa on h.d_account_id = wa.id where h.`d_account_id` = #{userId};
